original: // rdo rje rgyal mo'i bshags pa bzhugs so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal mo chags ba bzhugs so

original: rdo rje rgyal mo bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' //gsang sngags grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal mo bde ba gshegs ba bka sngags grub ba brnyes ba rnal byor ma

original: yon tan mang pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
analyzed: yon tan mang pos gro ba don mdzad ba

original: gang la yid kyis dmigs te bstod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: gang la yid kyis dmigs te bstod phyag tshal

original: bdag rmongs khyed kyi rigs rgyu ma 'tshal te //
analyzed: bdag rmongs khyed kyi rigs rgyu ma tshal te

original: mnyes par bgyi ba brtson pas ma bstan kyang //
analyzed: mnyes ba bgyid ba brtson ba ma ston kyang

original: sngon gyi thugs dam 'brel bas bdag bzung ste //
analyzed: sngon gyi thugs dam brel ba bdag bzung ste

original: sku gsum sgyu mar bstan pa bka' drin che //
analyzed: sku gsum sgyu mar ston ba bka drin che

analyzed: yid bzhin re skong khyed la phyag tshal stod

original: dus ngan snying ma'i gnas 'dir bdag skyes te //
analyzed: dus ngan snying ma gnas dir bdag skye te

analyzed: sdug sngal mang pos lus sems gdung ba la

analyzed: yun gyi dpal dang mgon du gsol debs na

analyzed: lha mo mthu chen bdag la rtag tu dgongs

original: rdo rje rgyal mos ma lus yongs bsal nas //

analyzed: bla med byang chub myur du thob ba mdzod

analyzed: tshe rabs kun tu dge ba bshes gnyen mched

original: nyon mongs bag med dbang du gyur pa yis //
